QuestData.Title: The Queen and Her Court
QuestData.Description: <Darn grunts.>$B$BHrmph.$B$BThings falling apart. Darn not happy. Now Darn's mate killed by spiders at Webwinder Hollow. Darn demands vengeance!$B$BHelp Darn? Kill Queen Silith and her little spiderlings? For Darn? For Darn's mate!$B$BWebwinder Hollow is northwest of here, up the path. Go!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Queen Silith and any 10 spiders in Webwinder Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: Darn still not very happy, but Darn will reward you for what you have done.
